title.rendered: Indian men’s hockey team creates history in Birmingham, biggest ever win at Commonwealth Games

content.rendered: The Indian men’s hockey team started their Birmingham CWG-2022 campaign with a buzzing win against Ghana on Sunday. Team India also recorded its biggest ever win by 11-0 in the history of commonwealth game. Captain Harman Preet Singh hit hat-trick and Jug raj Singh scored two goals during the match.

excerpt.rendered: The Indian men’s hockey team started their Birmingham CWG-2022 campaign with a buzzing win against Ghana on Sunday. Team India also recorded its biggest ever win by 11-0 in the history of commonwealth game. Captain Harman Preet Singh hit hat-trick and Jug raj Singh scored two goals during the match.
